demos.name: Mu-Analysis and Synthesis
demos.label: Mu-Analysis and Synthesis Demos
demos.description:
The Mu-Analysis and Synthesis Toolbox is a collection of MATLAB functions for use in the analysis and design of robust control systems.

The objective of this toolbox is to make available some recent developments in control theory, namely H-infinity optimal control and mu-analysis and synthesis, in the MATLAB environment. These methods have already had a significant impact on applications, but primarily among a small community with direct access to the theory and to various early versions of this software. A second objective is to build on top of MATLAB a rich set of data types and functions which are specifically oriented towards control design, and would be useful to any engineer using frequency domain and state-space methods, with or without mu.
